Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.UserController
@RequestMapping("/users") @RestController public class UserController extends Object
Restful api service that receives http requests about existed users in the calendar.
Author:
Hodaya David
